{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Apple |model=HomePod |revision=(A1639) |ean=0190198504517 |asin=B079SD5TPT;GB;,B079RNR6DY;GB; |price=349 |fcc_date=01/19/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model= |type=IoT hub, wireless speakers, media streamer |fcc_id=BCG-A1639 |ic_id=579C-A1639 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=AC |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Apple |cpu1_model=A8 (APL1011) |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 GiB |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=THGBX4G7D2LLDYC <!-- |fla2=16 GiB |fla2_brand=SK hynix |fla2_model=H2JTDG8UD1CMR --> |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H9CKNNNBKTCUSR |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wl1_module=USI 339S00450 |wl1_module_if=SDIO |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43572 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |addl_chips=Ultra-Low Power ARM MCU;STMicroelectronics;STM32L051C8;;1; ,,, Audio Amplifier;International Rectifier;PowlRaudio IR4311;;1; ,,, Audio Class-D Amplifier;Analog Devices;SSM35158;;7; ,,, ADC Audio Voice IC;Conexant (Synaptics);CX20810;;1; ,,, Touch Screen Controller PSoC;Cypress;CY8C4245;;1; ,,, 12-Channel (16-bit) ES-PWM RGB LED Driver w/ 3.3V Linear Regulator;Texas Instruments;TLC5971;;5; ,,, Power Management IC;Apple/Dialog;338S00100-AZ;;1; ,,, DC/DC Converter IC;Texas Instruments;TPS62130;;1; ,,, DC/DC Converter IC;Texas Instruments;TPS54560;;1; ,,, Microphones;MEMS;Knowles;;6; ,,, ;;;4350C, Y01742, TWN;;1; |flags=Bluetooth 5.0, Display OLED, Speaker, Siri support |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |oui= }} {{TagLine|Smart Wireless Speaker}} :[https://www.apple.com/homepod/ Product page]
[[Apple HomePod (A1639)]] - Manuf. P/N MQHW2B/A :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/BCG-A1639 BCG-A1639] (2018-01-19)
*{{WPLink|Apple HomePod}} {{see also|Amazon Echo Devices}}
{{FCC ST|07/17/2018|indexme.}}
===Specifications=== *Apple A8 processor *Wi-Fi AC with MIMO and BT 5.0 *4â€³ upward-firing woofer *Beamforming seven-tweeter array *Beamforming six-microphone array *Low-frequency microphone for :real-time woofer calibration *Top-mounted touch interface
===Teardown=== *[http://techinsights.com/about-techinsights/overview/blog/apple-homepod-teardown/ ''Apple HomePod Teardown'' on '''TechInsights'''] *[https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/HomePod+Teardown/103133 ''Teardown - Apple HomePod (A1639)'' on '''iFixit'''] <!-- :Apple A8 APL1011 SoC (Apple iPhone 6) - PoP RAM LPDDR4 :SK hynix H9CKNNNBKTCUSR1GB - RAM LPDDR4 SDRAM :Toshiba THGBX4G7D2LLDYC - 16GB (128Gb) NAND Flash or :SK hynix H2JTDG8UD1CMR - 16GB (128Gb) E2NAND3.0 NAND Flash :USI 339S00450 - WiFi/Bluetooth Module (Broadcom BCM43572) ::(iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X phones - BCM4361 ?) ::(iPhone 8/8 Plus - USI 339S00397 Wi-Fi/BT 5.0 - Broadcom BCM4361) ::(Galaxy S8 - Broadcom BCM4361, CC2640R2F, WCN3990, Dialog DA14586) :Apple/Dialog 338S00100-AZ - PMIC, DC/DC Texas Instruments TPS62130, TPS54560 ::(Apple/Dialog PMIC 338S1251 used in the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus) :Texas Instruments TLC5971 - LED Driver (x5) :Cypress CY8C4245 LQI-483 - Programmable SoC (touch control) :STMicroelectronics STM32L051C8T7 - Ultra-low Power ARM Cortex-M0 MCU :International Rectifier PowlRaudio 98-0431 - Class-D Audio Amplifier ::(IR (Infineon) Powlraudio IR43xx (IR4311 35W 4Ohm) :Analog Devices SSM35158 - Class-D Audio Amplifiers (x7) ::SSM3515 - Class-D Amplifier (8.4W RMS 8Ohm 107dB 1% THD) :Conexant (Synaptics) CX20810 - ADC Voice IC :MEMS Knowles microphones (x6) :4350C Y01742 TWN Audio? --> ===See also=== *[[Apple TV (A1469)]] *[[Apple TV (A1625)]] *[[Apple TV 4k (A1842)]] *[[Apple Siri Remote (A1962)]]
